scripts.upload: cd scripts && node upload-firmware.js && node update-revision.js
scripts.add-xhost: git subtree add --prefix frontend https://github.com/xperiments/xhost.git master --squash
scripts.pull-xhost: git subtree pull --prefix frontend https://github.com/xperiments/xhost.git master --squash
scripts.package: npm run revision && npm run import:xhost && npm run pack
scripts.build:fw: pio run -e d1 && pio run -e esp32-s2 && npm run ota:fw
scripts.build:fw-flash: pio run -e d1 --target=upload && pio run -e esp32-s2 --target=upload || exit 0 && npm run ota:fw
scripts.build:fs: pio run -e d1 --target buildfs && pio run -e esp32-s2 --target buildfs
scripts.build:base: npm run build:fs && npm run ota:fs --context=base
scripts.build:gh20b: npm run ota:patch --context=ghen_20b && npm run ota:fs --context=gh20b
scripts.build: npm run package && npm run build:fw && npm run build:base && npm run ota-dest
scripts.flash-back: npm run build:fw-flash && npm run backup:8266 && npm run backup:S2 && npm run build:gh20b
